name: パラメータ一覧検索用

sql:
SELECT
	COUNT(*) OVER () AS [LineCount],
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD,
	MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD,
	MCNTCT_ContactCD,
	MCNTCT_ContactName,
	MCNTCT_OrderDisplay,
	MCNTCT_ActiveFlg,
	MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate,
	MCNTCT_Note,
	MCNTCT_UpdateEmployeeCD,
	MCNTCT_UpdateDatetime
FROM
	M_Contact
WHERE
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD = @salesOrganizationCD
	AND MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD = @counterBrandCD
	AND (
		@contactName IS NULL
		OR (
			MCNTCT_ContactName LIKE @contactName ESCAPE '\'
		)
	)
	AND (
		@activeFlg IS NULL
		OR MCNTCT_ActiveFlg = @activeFlg
	)
ORDER BY
	MCNTCT_OrderDisplay,
	MCNTCT_ContactCD
	OFFSET @skiprows ROWS
	FETCH NEXT @pageline ROWS ONLY
name: 一覧検索クエリ
LoopStart
パラメータ追加用
追加クエリ
LoopEnd
LoopStart
パラメータ更新用

sql:
UPDATE M_Contact SET
	MCNTCT_ContactName = CASE
		WHEN ISNULL(@contactName,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ContactName, '#@NV@#')
			THEN @contactName
		ELSE MCNTCT_ContactName
	END,
	MCNTCT_OrderDisplay = CASE
		WHEN ISNULL(@orderDisplay,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_OrderDisplay, '#@NV@#')
			THEN @orderDisplay
		ELSE MCNTCT_OrderDisplay
	END,
	MCNTCT_ActiveFlg = CASE
		WHEN ISNULL(@activeFlg,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ActiveFlg, '#@NV@#')
			THEN @activeFlg
		ELSE MCNTCT_ActiveFlg
	END,
	MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate = CASE
		WHEN ISNULL(CONVERT(DATETIME,@flgChangeDate),CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56'))
			<> ISNULL(MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate, CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56'))
			THEN CONVERT(DATETIME,@flgChangeDate)
		ELSE MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate
	END,
	MCNTCT_Note = CASE
		WHEN ISNULL(@note,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_Note, '#@NV@#')
			THEN @note
		ELSE MCNTCT_Note
	END,
	MCNTCT_UpdateEmployeeCD = CASE
		WHEN (ISNULL(@contactName,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ContactName, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(@orderDisplay,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_OrderDisplay, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(@activeFlg,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ActiveFlg, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(CONVERT(DATETIME,@flgChangeDate),CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56'))
				<> ISNULL(MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate, CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56')))
			OR (ISNULL(@note,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_Note, '#@NV@#'))
		THEN @updateEmployeeCD
		ELSE MCNTCT_UpdateEmployeeCD
	END,
	MCNTCT_UpdateDatetime = CASE
		WHEN (ISNULL(@contactName,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ContactName, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(@orderDisplay,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_OrderDisplay, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(@activeFlg,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_ActiveFlg, '#@NV@#'))
			OR (ISNULL(CONVERT(DATETIME,@flgChangeDate),CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56'))
				<> ISNULL(MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate, CONVERT(DATETIME,'1900-01-01 12:34:56')))
			OR (ISNULL(@note,'#@NV@#') <> ISNULL(MCNTCT_Note, '#@NV@#'))
		THEN GETDATE()
		ELSE MCNTCT_UpdateDatetime
	END
OUTPUT inserted.MCNTCT_ContactCD
WHERE
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD = @salesOrganizationCD
	AND MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD = @counterBrandCD
	AND MCNTCT_ContactCD = @contactCD
name: 更新クエリ
LoopEnd
LoopStart
パラメータ更新用

sql:
DELETE FROM M_Contact
OUTPUT deleted.MCNTCT_ContactCD
WHERE
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD = @salesOrganizationCD
	AND MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD = @counterBrandCD
	AND MCNTCT_ContactCD = @contactCD
name: 削除クエリ
LoopEnd
パラメータ検索用

sql:
SELECT
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD,
	MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD,
	MCNTCT_ContactCD,
	MCNTCT_ContactName,
	MCNTCT_OrderDisplay,
	MCNTCT_ActiveFlg,
	MCNTCT_FlgChangeDate,
	MCNTCT_Note,
	MCNTCT_UpdateEmployeeCD,
	MCNTCT_UpdateDatetime
FROM
	M_Contact
WHERE
	MCNTCT_SalesOrganizationCD = @salesOrganizationCD
	AND MCNTCT_CounterBrandCD = @counterBrandCD
	AND MCNTCT_ContactCD = @contactCD
name: 検索クエリ
